name: Guerrilla Geek
description:
Guerrilla Geek are a london based creative agency specializing in SEO and digital marketing. Delivering big results.
Guerrilla Geek have as their aim a very simple object, help people build beautiful brands ensuring that reach their client's expectations.
Their team has bucket loads of experience in their respective fields and perhaps, more importantly, Guerrilla Geek are all extremely passionate about helping their clients to achieve their goals.
